title: Upstairs
description: Upstairs is a platform that connects users with local electricians, helping them find, evaluate, and schedule reliable services easily

title: DigiDerma
description: Digiderma is a mobile app that predicts skin diseases from images using machine learning for quick and accurate health insights

title: Signasense
description: SignaSense is a mobile app that translates sign language into text or speech, making communication more accessible and inclusive

title: Moviex
description: MovieX is a movie streaming web app that lets users browse, watch, and explore movies with a sleek, Netflix-like interface
